content.question: Which of the following best explains how sticklebacks in the same population with identical copies of the Pitx1 gene can still show phenotypic variation in the pelvic spine character?

choices.label: The Pitx1 gene is carried on different chromosomes in different individuals.
Expression of the Pitx1 gene is affected by mutations at other genetic loci.
The genetic code of the Pitx1 gene is translated differently in males and females.
The subcellular location of the Pitx1 gene changes when individuals move to a new environment.

content.answer: Expression of the Pitx1 gene is affected by mutations at other genetic loci.

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
